entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 3 - Episode 6 - Sunset
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 3 - Episode 6 - Sunset20140428
Walter's new assistant is fun. Yikes. This is INTENSE. It is
poetic to see Walter watch the RV be destroyed, but he would've
run away.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Games of Thrones - Season 4 - Episode 4 - Oathkeeper
entry.content:
Games of Thrones - Season 4 - Episode 4 - Oathkeeper20140428
Dany! You're so cool.

I almost cried at "Oathkeeper".

The show is filled with awful things, but sacrificing babies is
the worst. Craster and everyone who lives there are monsters.

That episode had remarkably little happen, although there were
lots of little establishing moments for future things.
  • TV Shows
  • Games of Thrones

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 3 - Bit by a Dead Bee
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 3 - Bit by a Dead Bee20140427
Oh man! I really like that Jesse is getting smarter. Ugggh, Wendy
is so gross. Woah! It's the Sunnydale Mayor!
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 4 - Down
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 4 - Down20140427
I feel like Skyler is trying to punish Walter and he's not
getting it. Oh man... Jesse's life sucks. He reminds me of my
brother in a very sad way. That tow truck drive could've taken
the deal... dumb guy. Oh man, I can't believe that!
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 5 - Breakage
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 5 - Breakage20140427
I can't believe she's smoking when she already had a baby born
with problems. I can't believe he doesn't shut the door to the
nursery when he's going through the money. I like that Jesse is
wising up. DBAA! Some of the people in this show look sooo
disturbing.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 6 - Peekaboo
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 6 - Peekaboo20140427
Spooch's house was so filthy and that kid was so sad. :(
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 7 - Negro y Azul
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 7 - Negro y Azul20140427
This was an intense episode. I like that Jesse is becoming more
sweet while Walter is becoming more hardcore.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 8 - Better Call Saul
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 8 - Better Call Saul20140427
I knew that guy was going to actually be a cop. Genius. The
lawyer, Saul, is intense. "You don't want a 'Criminal Lawyer',
you want a 'Criminal' Lawyer." I'm amazed that they would do this
for Badger AND not realize that he'd be watched forever. Jesse is
cute with his girlfriend!
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 9 - 4 Days Out
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 9 - 4 Days Out20140427
Oh no! The light was on! Yikes. That is an intense opening. And
it was an intense entire episode. It is interesting how they can
take a relatively mundane thing and then make it the subject of
the whole episode. I almost cried out of happiness for Walter.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 10 - Over
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 10 - Over20140427
These flash-forwards at the beginning are so weird. What's
Walter's problem? Jesse and his girl are so cute! But... :(
Skyler... quit being sketchy! Poor Jesse :( but that "Apology
Girl" thing was so cute. Sketchy! Yikes!
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 11 - Mandala
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 11 - Mandala20140427
I hope Jane stays clean, but oh no! :( I wonder if Walter will
kill the guy when he finds out his wife is cheating. Ugh! Oh
man... just when Jane and Jesse are so cute and happy... they
have to ruin everything. The Los Pollos is reminiscent of when
Jesse told Walter that he normally did deals in the taco
place. Naturally she'd go into labor while he's on a wicked drug
deal.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 12 - Phoenix
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 12 - Phoenix20140427
I love how episodes just flow together continuously. That is a
very fresh baby. That's unrealistic that a non-nurse would change
a diaper while in the hospital. It was kind of cute that Jane
laid Jesse on his side just like Walter did with Holly... but
WOAH... that is one way to solve the problem! Yikes!
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 13 - ABQ
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 2 - Episode 13 - ABQ20140427
This had better be one crazy finale! It's crazy that Jane's dad
basically talked Walter into killing her. This is a very somber
finale. I wonder how the crazy thing will go down at his
house. The surgery scene was surprisingly scary and freaky to
me. Yikes. She can know AND not know at the same time. In the ATC
scene, I like that you know something bad is happening but really
have no idea what anything he's saying means. That was a very
cheap realization of the pool scene.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 3 - Episode 1 - No Mas
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 3 - Episode 1 - No Mas20140427
I can't believe people cut off the crust of sandwiches. I like
Walter's pep talk about the crash. I wonder what Walter's
motivation will change into, because the show has to go on. I
think these two Mexicans may be on a quest to kill him.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 3 - Episode 2 - Caballo Sin Nombre
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 3 - Episode 2 - Caballo Sin Nombre20140427
I can't believe that they aren't talking about Holly much. Jesse!
That's quite the plan. That was a HUGE pizza. I feel like the
burn of Jesse's parents didn't sink in enough.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 3 - Episode 3 - I.F.T.
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 3 - Episode 3 - I.F.T.20140427
I can't believe Skyler would smoke so close to that baby. Ugh. I
can't believe Skyler. I feel like that is so much worse than
breaking unjust laws.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 3 - Episode 4 - Green Light
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 3 - Episode 4 - Green Light20140427
On one hand, it's crazy that Walter would care enough to yell at
Jesse, but on the other it's fun that he's passionate. It's crazy
that Skyler isn't worried that Ted will do the same thing, but
actually he is also a criminal.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 3 - Episode 5 - Mas
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 3 - Episode 5 - Mas20140427
"I apologize for being so transparent." That was a great
conversation. Skyler's lawyer is great. I'm surprised that Walter
doesn't want Jesse to work for him. It's interesting that Hank is
just now onto them when Walter isn't working with Jesse AND not
using the RV.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 1 - Episode 1 - Pilot
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 1 - Episode 1 - Pilot20140426
They do an amazing job making Walter's life look terrible and
sad. That was so rad how he protected his son's honor. And
amazing that he killed those guys!
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 1 - Episode 2 - Cat's In The Bag
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 1 - Episode 2 - Cat's In The Bag20140426
I can't tell if he is supposed to still be teaching
Chemistry. Hand sanitizer!
